ghostPost.title: DSNP Update: December 2021
ghostPost.excerpt:
In December, our contributors took some time to pause, rest, and reflect on a
productive year. We hope you had the opportunity to do so as well. We also
continued the chain selection process and have some information to share. As
always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at 
forums.projectliberty.io [https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

December DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * Chain selection update available. 
   https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/chain-s
ghostPost.plaintext:
In December, our contributors took some time to pause, rest, and reflect on a
productive year. We hope you had the opportunity to do so as well. We also
continued the chain selection process and have some information to share. As
always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at 
forums.projectliberty.io [https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

December DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * Chain selection update available. 
   https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/chain-selection-update-jan-2022 4
   [https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/chain-selection-update-jan-2022/168]/

Upcoming

 * In January, we will continue the chain selection process. We hope to finalize
   the chain at the beginning of February.
ghostPost.html:
In December, our contributors took some time to pause, rest, and reflect on a productive year. We hope you had the opportunity to do so as well. We also continued the chain selection process and have some information to share. As always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io.

December DSNP update - Summary of progress

  • Chain selection update available. https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/chain-selection-update-jan-2022 4/

Upcoming

  • In January, we will continue the chain selection process. We hope to finalize the chain at the beginning of February.
